name: Me, In 3-D
description:
The storm is coming!

Stick man was getting ready for another average day at the office when a mysterious black hole appears in front of his house while on his daily stroll to work. Stick man, suddenly, is teleported to a strange new dimension where everything is 3-D! Stick Man must unravel the mysteries of this strange new world in order to go back to his dimension.

Starting as a point n' click adventure, the game has a parallel dimension moment of its own when our point n' click friend finds himself in a 3-D platformer.

Me, In 3-D is my first 3D game created in 7 days for the Godot Wild Jam #11. The theme of this jam was “Parallel Dimensions".

> Controls:
- ‘WASD’ or Arrow Keys: Move character
- Mouse: Look around
- Shift or ‘E’: Sprint
- ‘Q’: Change camera perspective
- 'Space': Jump

> Plug in an Xbox controller and the controls become:

-  Left Joy Stick : Move character
- Right Joy Stick: Look around
- 'L2': Sprint
- 'Y': Change camera perspective
- 'A': Jump
